jobDescription: Castlight Health’s Quality Engineering team is seeking a summer intern  based in San Francisco, CA. Join us on our mission empowering people to make  the best choices for their health, and helping companies make the most of their  health benefits.  As an intern, you will have the unique opportunity to contribute to the quality  assurance of products with far reaching impacts on the health care decisions of  millions of people. Our quality engineering team is composed of experts in all  quality assurance and test automation disciplines. You’ll have the opportunity  to learn from the best whether your interest is test framework development,  data validation, mobile test automation or quality engineering’s role in  release management. Pursuing a Bachelors/Masters/PhD Degree in Computer Science or related fieldComputer Science coursework or project experience in software engineeringDemonstrated ability to work well as a member of a teamExcellent written and spoken communicationPreferred:UI or API AutomationKnowledge of Java and Java-based testing frameworksLinuxBasic scripting using Python or BashAgile experience
